q_en: Please release 100 units of cotton fabric from the Main warehouse.
gt:
Sure thing! Here's the update on your request to release 100 units of Cotton Fabric from the Main Warehouse:

| Material Name   | Warehouse Name | Current Stock | Units Released | New Stock Level |
|-----------------|----------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------|
| Cotton Fabric   | Main Warehouse | 3400          | 100            | 3300            |

ðŸŽ‰ Success! We've successfully released 100 units of Cotton Fabric from the Main Warehouse. The new stock level is now 3300 units. If there's anything else you need, just let me know! ðŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse WHERE name = 'Main Warehouse';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse ID for the warehouse with the name "Main Warehouse"

steps.sql: SELECT id, left_number FROM warehouse_material WHERE material_id = '1' AND warehouse_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse material ID and the current left number for the specific material in the specified warehouse

steps.sql: UPDATE warehouse_material SET left_number = left_number - 100 WHERE id = '1';
steps.description: Update the left number of the material in the warehouse by subtracting 100 units
